title: Jian Wang 3: Xia Gan Yi Dan Shen Jianxin 3rd Season

synonyms: JX3: Chivalrous Hero Shen Jianxin 3rd Season
剑网3·侠肝义胆沈剑心 第三季 上部
剑网3·侠肝义胆沈剑心 第三季 上卷
alternative_titles.en: JX Online3：The Adventure of Shen Jianxin 3rd Season
alternative_titles.ja: 剑网3·侠肝义胆沈剑心 第三季

synopsis:
The martial arts world is no longer peaceful. Shen Jianxin has been packaged as a "top figure in the martial arts world," the people of Qingshui Island have mysteriously disappeared, and what exactly does Assassin, the mastermind behind Lake Link, want to do? What changes will occur in Chang'an?

(Source: Bilibili, translated)
